article_title: Israeli military announces first soldier killed inside Lebanon.
sentence: Israeli  military  announces  first  soldier  killed  inside  Lebanon.

article_title: Israeli military announces first soldier killed inside Lebanon.
sentence: The  death  of  the  first  Israeli  soldier  killed  inside  Lebanon  since  the  ground  invasion  has  been  confirmed.

article_title: Israeli military announces first soldier killed inside Lebanon.
sentence: The  Israeli  Defense  Forces  (IDF)  announced  in  a  statement  that  Captain  Eitan  Yitzhak  Oster,  22,  was  killed  inside  Lebanon  on  Wednesday.
